projects.name: A gentle introduction to shielded transactions
projects.summary: Redshift Zero introduced shielded transactions in blog {{name}}, discussing how to use them in privacy payment systems like ZCash and how to implement privacy protection in Bitcoin-shaped UTXO-based protocols.

projects.name: Split Prover Zero-Knowledge SNARKs
projects.summary: Garg et al. proposed split prover zkSNARKs in paper {{name}}, allowing Alice to delegate part of the zkSNARK computation tasks to helper Bob, while ensuring data privacy and proof indistinguishability.
